H0.text: Newton (n) is the SI unit for weight.

H1.text: Kilograms (kg) are the SI unit for weight.

H2.text: Meters (m) are the SI unit for weight.

H3.text: Pounds (lbs) is the SI unit for weight.

A4.text: The newton is the SI unit of force, defined as 1 kg⋅m/s².

A5.text: The kilogram is the SI unit of mass, not weight.
